2.1.1.name: wordpress/lidoli
2.1.1.description: Install Lidoli plugin on your WP in a few clicks and start sharing valuable ratings and reviews about any product and services on the web... either yours, or others. lidoli™ allows in-depth analysis thanks to its multi-criteria capability, and instant visualisation of all the ratings thanks to the "qualidget". More details on http://www.lidoli.com
